data.eml:eml: Description of three new species of Hylopanchax Poll & Lambert, 1965 from the central Congo Basin (Cyprinodontiformes: Poeciliidae: Procatopodini) with a redefinition of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Van Der Zee, Jouke R., Sonnenberg, Rainer, Schliewen, Ulrich K. (2013): Description of three new species of Hylopanchax Poll & Lambert, 1965 from the central Congo Basin (Cyprinodontiformes: Poeciliidae: Procatopodini) with a redefinition of the genus. Zootaxa 3701 (1): 35-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3701.1.3
